channel.title: Posts on An Athiest's Guide to Moral Living
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on An Athiest's Guide to Moral Living

item.title: 1. Respect other systems, species and life forms
item.description: Humans are above other species in intellect. We are as of now the only sentient, conscious beings. However this does not raise us above the interconnectedness of the complex system we live in. We must respect other systems, species and life forms.

item.title: 2. Treat All Humans Equally
item.description: No human should consider delegation of responsibility as the right to absolute authority We need organise hierarchically purely for the purposes of efficient organisation. These are artificial constructs and hold no bearing. No one is truly above anyone. It is only necessary for the functioning of orginizations Treat all humans equally

item.title: 3. Do service to humanity
item.description: Do service to humanity Strive to give back to society We all walk on top of the accomplishments of society Do not lead a selfish life Pursue societal happiness

item.title: 4. Learn your place in the universe
item.description: The Universe is grand and complex Attempt to learn your place in it Understand our place in the galaxy Appreciate the apparent improbability of life Seek knowledge

item.title: 5. Different behaviours are better for society than others
item.description: There are sets of behaviour that lead to greater societal utility We can rank preferences They are not all equal Be aware and use this principle in your decision making Do not pursue irrelevant artificial constructs

item.title: 6. What is right is contextually appropriate
item.description: What is right is contextually appropriate Society changes Learn to be flexible and change your views

item.title: 7. Attempt the pursuit of peaceful mortality
item.description: Attempt the pursuit of peaceful mortality Appreciate life not in the face of death Make change when you are happy

item.title: 8. Learn from your fellow humans
item.description: Learn from your fellow humans Respect the value of life experience no matter the subject matter

item.title: 9. Aim to live a balanced life
item.description: Aim to live a balanced life Even extreme lives can be balanced Remember that life is long. There is always time. If there is no time you have waited too long

item.title: 10. Meditate. Appreciate the complexity of consciousness
item.description: Meditate. Appreciate the complexity of consciousness Appreciate the difference between logic and emotion

item.title: 11. Focus on your being
item.description: Focus on your being as being a component of the universe not an inhabitant

item.title: 12. Learn contempt
item.description: There is, on average, always someone worse off or someone better of than you. Learn to be contempt with your position

item.title: 13. Learn truths for yourself
item.description: Learn truths for yourself Do not take a teachers word blindly

item.title: 14. Seek energy from community
item.description: Seek energy from community when you lack it Mass cooperation is the feature of societal progress
